briefdescription.para: Contains the private parts of the Cygnus Reach firmware stack supporting the file service.

simplesect.para: Functions that are not static are prefixed with pvtCrFile_. The entire contents can be excluded from the build when INCLUDE_FILE_SERVICE is not defined.
